thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I bought "Premium Cross-Drilled & Slotted Brake Rotors" because of their life time warranty. The front rotors where warped after few months so I called them. Although it's mentioned in their warranty policies that the warped rotors need to be received before sending the replacements, but the manager made an exception and agreed that I buy an up front replacement set, change them and then they will refund the replacement set after receiving the old ones.
